title: What is actually being done to players who are abusive?
body:
So for the umpteenth time this season I've been told to kill myself, which I'm sure other people have experienced as well. Can anyone tell me what is actually happening to the players. Because I'll report and they never get banned. It was my understanding that it was against the summoners code. 
End of game chat : Not naming him - 
morg
i hope you end it tonight
go slit your throat
you desreve to be fkng beheded

To which he continued for several minutes - even the other team told him to chill out. 

Any reds out there happy to explain the banning process?

replies.body:
Suicide encouragement and that ilk are classed as no tolerance language and result in an instant 14-day ban following into a permanent if they offend again. Players get one and only one warning for such behaviour.

That said, the IFS is a learning system that [doesn't work on keywords](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Ifb0rpEJ-riot-should-just-make-a-list-of-banned-words-and-how-not-to-be-condescending) (it physically can't) which means it has to learn all the creative ways of saying such bullshit first. If you experience such behaviour, your first step is to report it. If you can't report (dodged the game, post-game doesn't load, etc) or if you feel it hasn't been addressed for whatever reason, you can submit a ticket to player support for a manual review.

Do be aware that support cannot tell you *anything* about another player's account. They cannot even imply anything, primarily because of privacy concerns. As a result, you will get a generic "thanks for your report" type reply to your ticket, but rest assured that it will be reviewed.

Also bear in mind that manual review is not a fast process, where the IFS can punish within 15 minutes of a game's end, so for one don't get impatient with tickets, and for two, always use the post-game report where you can to give the system more data points to learn from. Report comments also help in this regard.
